trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGZG008_05171_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> The wistful woman hurriedly casts her gaze high and low.
TEXT_KINGZG008_05171_TODO_01<tab>Present the heirloom ring to the wistful woman.
TEXT_KINGZG008_05171_LOOKINGWOMAN05171_000_000<tab>Would you mind giving me a hand? I'm trying to find my ring. I think I must've lost it trying to escape during the attack.
TEXT_KINGZG008_05171_LOOKINGWOMAN05171_000_001<tab>It's a plain band set with a black stone. Nothing fancy, but it's important to me─we've had it in our family for generations.

TEXT_KINGZG008_05171_LOOKINGWOMAN05171_000_002<tab>Before the raid, I was doing some shopping in the Nexus Arcade, so I figure it's around here someplace. Thing is, there's too much ground to cover alone...
TEXT_KINGZG008_05171_LOOKINGWOMAN05171_000_003<tab>Could I trouble you to search north of the arcade? You'd be doing me a huge favor. I'll keep looking around here. Let me know if you find anything.
TEXT_KINGZG008_05171_LOOKINGWOMAN05171_000_005<tab>Do me a favor and search the north side of the arcade, okay? I'd really appreciate it.
TEXT_KINGZG008_05171_LOOKINGWOMAN05171_000_010<tab>No luck here, I'm afraid. Did you fare any better?
TEXT_KINGZG008_05171_LOOKINGWOMAN05171_000_011<tab>Oh, this is it, no mistake! Thank you so much!

TEXT_KINGZG008_05171_LOOKINGWOMAN05171_000_012<tab>I guess I should tell you a little more about the ring after you went to all that trouble. Hundreds of years ago there was a terrible war we know as the Storm Surge. One of my ancestors─a scientist─had it made as an engagement ring.

TEXT_KINGZG008_05171_LOOKINGWOMAN05171_000_013<tab>The little black stone? That's raw electrope ore. Apparently, they snuck a small chunk out of the laboratory they were working at to use for the ring.

TEXT_KINGZG008_05171_LOOKINGWOMAN05171_000_014<tab>Back then, electrope ore was worth a small fortune. A gesture like that would've been a surefire way to anyone's heart─well, according to my mother at least.

TEXT_KINGZG008_05171_LOOKINGWOMAN05171_000_015<tab>Of course, these days electrope is more readily attainable, and without any circuits printed on it, a gem like this is nothing more than a bit of lightning-aspected rock.

TEXT_KINGZG008_05171_LOOKINGWOMAN05171_000_016<tab>Still, every time I look at it, I can't help but wonder about my ancestors and the lives they led. I suppose I'll never find out whether the ring was enough to send sparks flying, or if they were wed when all was said and done.
TEXT_KINGZG008_05171_LOOKINGWOMAN05171_000_017<tab>Thanks again for your help. I'll try and be more careful next time I'm fleeing murderous mechanical soldiers...
